meta.name: Haven Productions
meta.about:
Haven Productions is a UK based international sales, production and UK distribution company, with a strong focus on Hong Kong films, telling stories of HKers.

Haven 設於英國，專注製作及發行香港電影，講香港人故事。

Facebook - fb.me/havenproductionsuk
Telegram - t.me/havenproductions
Instagram - instagram.com/havenproductionsuk
Twitter - twitter.com/haven_ltd
